description: Application of the principles developed in MSE 222 to specific problems in electronics technology. Preparation, physical and chemical properties of materials used in electronic devices, and integrated circuit fabrication. Bulk semiconductors; thin film oxides and metals; polymers and ceramics. Defect characterization and control of properties. Format: Lecture, Labs and Readings from current literature. Remedial self-taught labs will be provided for students unfamiliar with electronic measurements. Extensive use of computer-controlled experiments will be made.
name: ELECTRONIC MATERIALS II
